original_text: Even when Paul had said all this, the people still wanted to offer sacrifices to him and Barnabas. Finally Paul and Barnabas were able to stop them.
korean_text: 이렇게 말하여 겨우 무리를 말려 자기들에게 제사를 못하게 하니라

sentences.original_text: Even when Paul had said all this
sentences.korean_translation: 바울이 이 모든 것을 말했을 때조차도

sentences.original_text: the people still wanted to offer sacrifices
sentences.korean_translation: 백성들은 여전히 제사를 드리고 싶어 했습니다

sentences.original_text: Finally Paul and Barnabas were able to stop them
sentences.korean_translation: 마침내 바울과 바나바는 그들을 막을 수 있었습니다
